children.text: You can find more operations in the
Try selecting multiple cells, then right-click on the selection and click "Merge Cells". Sometimes you may notice that rows or columns have collapsed. This is normal behavior for a DOM table.
Hover the mouse over the edge of the column, and then you can see the column resizer.
You can drag the handles on both sides of the image to resize it.
External images can also be dragged into the editor.
Select any text to format it.
Right-click to open the context menu.
